name: Psychopath (IcarusDev)
description:
Deep Underground A Mall Can you survive the Horrors?

You are brought into an Abandoned Shopping Mall Complex with the intentions of exploring the underground facilities. However, Ghostly and Deadly Spirits roam around the areas, can you survive the Haunted Environment and Escape?

Controls:

  • WASD - Move Around
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Shift - Run
  • Left CTRL - Crouch
  • Left Click - Interact
  • Right Click - Flashlight
  • Scroll Wheel - Switch Items
  • F - Drop Item

They have been waiting for you. 

DEVELOPER'S NOTE: Hello! I am a 14-Year-Old Game Developer currently studying right now so don't expect a full triple-a game, but I promise a disturbing horror experience that will not disappoint!
